results.title: Effect of Simvastatin Use in Free Tissue Transfer: An Experimental Study in a Rat Epigastric Free Flap Model.

results.title: Local Administration of Simvastatin Stimulates Healing of an Avascular Meniscus in a Rabbit Model of a Meniscal Defect.
results.text_hl: CLINICAL RELEVANCE: This study suggests that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ stimulated intrinsic healing of an avascular @<m>DISEASE_Tibial_Meniscus_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000070600 @@@meniscus@@@.
